message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Given my budget constraints, I am unable to increase my offer beyond $12,000. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
